447102.description: ZZ'Rot: Basic attacks [[on-attack]] and damaging abilities against enemies summon 8 allied {{ui|Voidmite|Voidmites}} that are {{tip|untargetable}} and attack the target (15 second cooldown). {{ui|Voidmite|Voidmites}} deal {{as|6|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 4% of your AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% of your AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} with each of their basic attacks and last for up to 3 seconds. Additionally, summon 6 {{ui|Voidmite|Voidmites}} upon your death.

447103.name: Hemomancer's Helm
447103.description: Scarlet Allegiance: If your {{stil|life steal}} and {{stil|omnivamp}} sum to at least 30%, gain {{as|500 '''bonus''' health}} and {{tip|heal}} yourself equal to 10% of the damage that enemy champions in a {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 525 units radius around you take from all sources.

447104.name: Innervating Locket
447104.description: Fill the Soul: Gain a charge each time you or champions within 800 units cast an [[champion ability|ability]], up to 30. At maximum charges, gain {{as|{{pp|100 to 250}} ability power}} and {{as|{{pp|15 to 25|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for the rest of the round, as well as a {{pp|400 to 750}} {{tip|shield}} that lasts until destroyed. Charges are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

447105.name: Empyrean Promise
447105.description: Vigilance: {{tip|Dash}} to the current location of your ally and upon completion grant both yourself and the ally a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|100 to 250}} {{as|(+ 100% of your AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% of your '''bonus''' health)}} damage for 5 seconds. '''Can be used even while the ally is dead.'''

447106.name: Dragonheart
447106.description:
Inner Flame: Every 2 rounds, gain a random {{bi|Dragon Soul}}. Additionally, increase your '''total''' {{as|attack damage}}, {{as|ability power}}, {{as|attack speed}}, {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, {{as|armor}}, {{as|magic resistance}}, and {{as|ability haste}} by 4% for each {{bi|Dragon Soul}} you possess, up to 30% at maximum souls.

Once you have obtained all 6 {{bi|Dragon Soul|Dragon Souls}}, you also gain the {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}} buff permanently at the next round interval. This buff counts as a soul for this effect, for a total stat increase of 35%.

447107.name: Decapitator
447107.description: Anticipation: [[Basic attack]]s and [[Champion ability|basic ability]] casts generate 1 and 2 stacks of ''Anticipation'' for the rest of the round, respectively, stacking up to 40 times. For each stack, increase your ultimate ability's damage by 3% and gain 2 [[Haste#Ultimate haste|ultimate haste]], up to 120% increased ultimate damage and 80 ultimate haste. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

447108.name: Runecarver
447108.description:
Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.
Helix: Dealing damage with an ability generates 30 ''Energize'' stacks and triggers the effects of {{tip|Energized}} attacks if they are ready ({{fd|2.5}}-second cooldown per {{tip|cast instance}}).
Spiral Out: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack generates a ''Rune'' stack and fires a missile at the target for each ''Rune'' stack you have, dealing {{as|{{pp|20 to 45}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 11% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.3}} per 100 '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} with each missile. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

447109.name: Cruelty
447109.description: Watch Them Fall: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion summons a comet above them that lands at their current location after 1 second, dealing {{as|{{pp|50 to 150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% of your '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area (6 second cooldown per target per {{tip|cast instance}}).

447110.name: Moonflair Spellblade
447110.description: Relentless: Casting an ability {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} your basic attack timer and empowers your next two basic attacks with {{as|90% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. Additionally, each basic attack [[on-attack]] reduces the cooldowns of all your abilities by {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

447112.name: Flesheater
447112.description:
Hack the Meat: Dealing damage reduces the target's {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} by 3 for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times for a total resistances reduction of 30. Stacks can be applied to each enemy only once every second.
Cannibalize: If you or the allied champion on your team score a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion, you are both {{tip|heal|healed}} for {{as|18% of the taken down target's '''maximum''' health}}.

447113.name: Detonation Orb
447113.description: The Bomb: Dealing ability damage against enemy champions marks them for 3 seconds, storing 20% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} you deal to them, increased to 25% if they are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}. Each instance of your ability damage dealt to a marked target refreshes their mark. Once the mark expires, it detonates to deal {{as|true damage}} equal to the amount stored against the target. If a mark would deal lethal damage to the target, it is detonated immediately.

447114.name: Reverberation
447114.description:
Reverberate: After 2 seconds from the start of the combat phase in each round, gain {{as|5 '''bonus''' health}} per {{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
Resonate: Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} deal {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 2% of your '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
Rumble: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} an enemy champion generates 25 stacks of ''Reverberation'' for 10 seconds, stacking up to 100 times and refreshing {{tip|on-hit}} as well as on subsequent immobilizations. At '''maximum''' stacks and upon {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} an enemy, your on-hit effects are applied to them 3 times.

447115.name: Regicide
447115.description: End the Line: At the start of the combat phase in each round, declare the enemy champion with the lowest {{as|'''total maximum''' health}} as the ''Regent''. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against the ''Regent'' for the first time in the combat phase grants you {{as|10 '''bonus''' attack damage}} permanently and sets the '''current''' cooldown of your ultimate ability to {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

447116.name: Kinkou Jitte
447116.description: Between the Ribs: You can now identify the ''Weakpoints'' of nearby enemy champions, marked as an arc around them and pointing towards a specific direction. ''Weakpoints'' on targets take 4 seconds to become exposed and linger for {{fd|11.25}} seconds afterwards. Dealing damage in the direction of an exposed ''Weakpoint'' will consume it to deal {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} equal to {{as|3%|hp}} {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AD)}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of the target's '''maximum''' health}} and grant you {{as|{{pp|30 to 75|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Once a target's ''Weakpoint'' is consumed or expires, you identify a new ''Weakpoint'' on them.

447118.name: Pyromancer's Cloak
447118.description:
Spark: Basic attacks and ability hits against enemies inflicts them with a {{as|Burn}} that deals{{ft|{{as|{{pp|200 to 450}} magic damage}} over 3 seconds.|{{as|{{pp|200/12 to 450/12}} magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over 3 seconds.}} Cleansing Flame: Inflicting an enemy champion with a {{as|Burn|buzzword3}} effect releases a fireball from the target, landing to a location near you after {{fd|0.5}} seconds. Upon landing, a blaze is created at the impact area with a radius of 175 units, lasting for 5 seconds (3 second cooldown per target). While you are within the blaze, gain {{as|20% '''bonus total''' movement speed}}, lingering for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after exiting, and {{tip|heal}} for {{pp|60 to 150}} upon entering and each second of the blaze's lifetime thereafter. While enemies are within the blaze, they are dealt {{as|100 magic damage}} every second.

For each unique {{as|Burn|buzzword3}} effect source that you have, up to 10, increase the blaze's size by 40 units, and its strength by {{as|4% '''bonus total''' movement speed}} and {{as|30|hsp}} healing per second for the buff and {{as|60 magic damage}} per tick for the enemy effect.

447119.name: Lightning Rod
447119.description:
Call Lightning: {{as|Automatically|river}} summon a storm cloud above you, which strikes a lightning bolt at your current location after {{fd|1.5}} seconds to deal {{as|{{pp|135 to 230}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|slow}} them by 30% for 2 seconds. If you are within the lightning strike, gain a {{tip|shield}} equal to {{as|14% of your '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}} for 2 seconds.
Fully Automated: {{as|Automatic|river}} effects have their cooldown reduced by 1 second and now benefit from your {{as|ability haste}}. ''Call Lightning's'' cooldown cannot be reduced below 5 seconds by this effect.

447120.name: Diamond-Tipped Spear
447120.description:
Reach Weapon: Gain {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' attack range}}.
Sweet Spot: Basic attacks deal {{pp|0 to 30 for 11|0 to 1000|key=%|type=distance|label1=units}} increased damage and abilities deal {{pp|0 to 40 for 11|0 to 1000|key=%|type=distance|label1=units}} increased damage. The distance is calculated from your {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} current position to the target's position when the triggering attack or ability hits them.

447121.name: Twilight's Edge
447121.description:
The Path Between: If you have at least {{as|130 '''bonus''' attack damage}} and {{as|180 ability power}}, enter either the ''Material World'' or the ''Spirit World'', determined randomly, at the start of the combat phase in each round:

'''Material World''': Increase your {{as|attack damage}} by 20% and gain {{as|{{pp|50 to 150|key=%}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
'''Spirit World''': Increase your {{as|ability power}} by 20% and gain {{as|{{pp|30 to 120}} ability haste}}.

447122.name: Black Hole Gauntlet
447122.description:
Accretion: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] and {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects against enemy champions generate 1 and 5 stacks of ''Accretion'', respectively, up to 50. For each ''Accretion'' stack, gain {{as|10% '''base''' health regeneration}}, up to {{as|500% '''base''' health regeneration}} at '''maximum''' stacks. Additionally, for every 10 ''Accretion'' stacks, gain 20% increased size, up to 100% at '''maximum''' stacks. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.
Dark Star: Summon a black hole at the target location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay that lasts for 2 {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 100 '''bonus''' health)}} seconds. Enemies within are dealt {{as|{{pp|30 to 100}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|6.5}}% of user's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} every second, {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 35%, and {{tip|kinematics|dragged}} inward until they reach the horizon at the center. Additionally, for each enemy champion inside the black hole, generate 1 stack of ''Accretion'' per second.

447123.name: Puppeteer
447123.description:
Pull Their Strings: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] against enemy champions apply a ''Puppeteer'' stack for 15 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. The fourth stack against a target consumes them all to render the target {{tip|berserk}} for 2 seconds, causing them to gain {{as|50%|as}} {{as|(+ 150% of your heal and shield power)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} and {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}} (25 second cooldown). If only one champion is alive on the enemy team, instead {{tip|fear}} the target for the same duration.
: Granting yourself or an ally a {{tip|heal}}, {{tip|shield}}, or [[champion ability|ability-sourced]] buff reduces the cooldown of ''Pull Their Strings'' by 5 seconds, once per cast.
